TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeMapper extends System.Object

summary.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

span.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 高级 WPF 方案中，提供备用上下文一部分和。 is part of an advanced WPF scenario that supplies alternate context for and . 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]WPF 应用程序，则应考虑重写对于此方案中，而不是尝试使用。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] WPF applications, you should consider overriding for this scenario, rather than attempting to use . 可用于提供自定义映射信息通过比的应用程序的更直接的技术，XAML 分析器上的程序集代码的值。 can be used to provide the XAML parser with custom mapping information through a more direct technique than the application of values on the assembly code. 这可能很有用的程序集中的所有 CLR 命名空间合并或引用类型中的现有程序集而无需重新编译它只是要添加的 XAML 就绪属性设置。This might be useful for consolidation of all CLR namespaces in an assembly, or for referencing types that are XAML-ready in an existing assembly without having to recompile it just to add attributing. 通常创建实例，以指定属性值。You typically create a instance in order to specify the property value for a . 又可用作的上下文调用。The in turn can be used as the context for a call. ## 默认映射器Default Mapper 你可以获取默认映射程序使用静态属性。You can obtain a default mapper using the static property. 默认映射器仅适用于默认程序集列表。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 有关程序集没有特定信息 (如在中指定构造函数) 使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未由子类重写始终返回`false`。If not overridden by a subclass, always returns `false`. 当由子类重写，该行为应是应返回`true`内部类型可访问; 否则为如果`false`。When overridden by a subclass, the behavior should be that should return `true` if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, `false`.

summary.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.

span.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.
The default type mapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认映射器仅适用于默认程序集列表。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 有关程序集没有特定信息 (如在中指定构造函数) 使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used. 在当前实现中的默认程序集列表是： `WindowsBase`， `PresentationCore`， `PresentationFramework`。In the current implementation the default assembly list is: `WindowsBase`, `PresentationCore`, `PresentationFramework`. 使用默认映射器并不意味着，您不能使用自定义程序集/类型在 XAML 中根本。Using the default mapper does not mean that you cannot use custom assemblies/types in XAML at all. 它只意味着如果您使用自定义类型/程序集，您必须再使用创建作为映射的常规 XAML 技术`xmlns`类型/程序集引用的位置，而不是类型映射器 API 每个 XAML 页面中的属性。It only means that if you do use custom types/assemblies, you must then use the conventional XAML technique of creating the mappings as `xmlns` attributes in each XAML page where the types/assemblies are referenced, as opposed to a type mapper API. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

span.span: The for the object, or if no mapping could be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法找到的类型，它映射到提供的信息，`null`返回。If a type cannot be found that maps to the provided information, `null` is returned. 不作为的一部分包括前缀`localName`。Do not include the prefix as part of `localName`. 对于任何前缀 XAML 元素的信息，将其分隔成`xmlNamespace`和`localName`此 API 调用的组件。For any prefixed XAML element information, separate it into `xmlNamespace` and `localName` components for this API call.
